summary: This is a transcript of grand jury testimony from April 24, 2007, in the Southern District of Florida as part of 'Operation Leap Year.' A female witness, age 21, testifies about being recruited at age 16 to give massages to Jeffrey Epstein, the nature of the massages involving nudity and touching, and her subsequent role in recruiting other underage girls for Epstein, detailing the recruitment process, payments, and specific individuals involved. This document is a transcript of grand jury testimony from a witness (likely a victim/recruiter) describing the process of bringing girls to Jeffrey Epstein's residence for massages that turned sexual. The witness details interactions with Epstein and his assistant, payment structures, and Epstein's preference for younger girls.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The central figure in the investigation. The witness describes being recruited to massage him, the sexual nature of the encounters, and his role in paying for and requesting underage girls.

persons.name: Paula E. Angelocci
persons.context: The court reporter who recorded the sworn grand jury testimony on April 24, 2007.

persons.name: Sarah
persons.context: A high school acquaintance of the witness who, along with another girl, first proposed the witness work for Epstein by giving massages involving nudity and fondling.

persons.name: Nadia
persons.context: A high school acquaintance of the witness who, along with Sarah, first proposed the witness work for Epstein by giving massages involving nudity and fondling.

persons.name: Adriana
persons.context: Described as Jeffrey Epstein's assistant. The witness states Adriana was the primary contact for scheduling appointments, would often escort girls upstairs, and was present at the house.

persons.name: Jenna
persons.context: One of the girls the witness recruited for Epstein. The witness states Epstein specifically requested Jenna on several occasions and liked her the best.

persons.name: Maria
persons.context: One of the girls the witness recruited for Epstein. The witness confirms she brought Maria to Epstein's house.

persons.name: Sasha
persons.context: One of the girls the witness recruited for Epstein. The witness confirms she brought Sasha to Epstein's house.

persons.name: Caitlyn
persons.context: One of the girls the witness recruited for Epstein. The witness confirms she brought Caitlyn to Epstein's house.

persons.name: Jill
persons.context: One of the girls the witness recruited for Epstein. The witness confirms she brought Jill to Epstein's house.

persons.name: Tiffany
persons.context: One of the girls the witness recruited for Epstein. The witness states Tiffany was 14 years old when brought to Epstein.

persons.name: Chloe
persons.context: A girl the witness brought to Epstein's house who was 23 years old. Epstein reportedly thought she was 'too old' and she was not brought back.

persons.name: Brooke
persons.context: A girl the witness brought to Epstein's house. Epstein and Brooke had an argument because she decided not to perform 'what was necessary,' and she was not brought back.

persons.name: Megan
persons.context: A person who accompanied the witness to Epstein's house once or twice and waited in the kitchen, but who never worked for or massaged Epstein.

persons.name: Sarah Kellen
persons.context: Identified as Epstein's assistant who coordinated appointments, took down girls' contact information, and escorted them upstairs. The witness discusses her knowledge of the sexual activities.

connections.description: Sarah was working for Epstein and recruited the witness on his behalf, explaining the nature of the massages.
Nadia was working for Epstein and recruited the witness on his behalf, along with Sarah.
Adriana is identified as Epstein's assistant, handling scheduling, greeting girls at the house, and often escorting them upstairs.
The witness was recruited at age 16 to massage Epstein, during which he fondled her. She later became a recruiter for him.
The witness knew Sarah from high school; they were in the same grade. Sarah was the initial point of contact for the Epstein proposition.
The witness knew Nadia as an acquaintance; Nadia was part of the initial recruitment along with Sarah.
The witness's primary contact for scheduling appointments with Epstein. Their interactions were described as 'pure business.'
The witness recruited Jenna for Epstein. Epstein specifically requested Jenna on multiple occasions.
Epstein specifically requested the underage girl Jenna for massages and was said to like her 'the best.'
Kellen is identified as Epstein's assistant who handled scheduling and initial contact with girls brought for massages.
Kellen was the primary contact for scheduling appointments for the witness to bring girls to Epstein's residence.

events.title: Grand Jury Testimony
events.description: A witness provides sworn testimony before a federal grand jury in West Palm Beach regarding her involvement with Jeffrey Epstein and the recruitment of underage girls.

events.title: Witness's Initial Recruitment
events.description: The witness, approximately 16 years old, is propositioned by acquaintances Sarah and Nadia to massage Jeffrey Epstein for money, with expectations of nudity and fondling.

events.title: Witness's Recruitment of Other Girls
events.description: After her own massage experience, the witness begins recruiting other girls, primarily from high school aged 14-18, to go to Epstein's house for massages, following Epstein's rule that girls must know about the nudity and touching beforehand.

events.title: Police Interview of Witness
events.description: Prior to the grand jury, the witness was interviewed by the Palm Beach Police Department, where she explained the two-tiered payment system with Epstein.

events.title: Witness's period of involvement with Epstein
events.description: The witness states she was bringing girls to Jeffrey Epstein's residence during her junior/senior year of high school, which she estimates was around 2003-2005.

locations: Federal Building, U.S. Courthouse, West Palm Beach, Florida
524 South Andrews Avenue, Suite 302N, Fort Lauderdale, Florida (Court Reporter's office)
keyFacts: The witness was recruited at age 16 by high school acquaintances to give massages to Jeffrey Epstein, with the understanding it involved nudity and fondling for $200.
After one massage where Epstein fondled her and she expressed discomfort, Epstein proposed she instead recruit other girls, paying her $200 for each girl brought.
The witness recruited between 7 and 10 girls, most aged 14-18 from her high school, and instructed them to lie about their age if under 18.
Epstein's assistant, Adriana, was the primary scheduler, and Epstein had a rule that girls must be informed about the nudity and touching before arriving.
Payments were made in $100 bills, and payment amounts to the girls performing massages varied ($100-$400) based on how much they allowed Epstein to do.
The witness was asked by Jeffrey Epstein himself to recruit other girls for massages.
Epstein's assistant, Sarah Kellen, handled scheduling, took down girls' names and numbers, but denied knowledge of intercourse, stating Epstein 'just plays with them.'
Age was never verified or discussed, though the witness recalls Epstein once saying 'the younger the better' and commenting a girl was 'too old.'
Payment varied; one girl received $100 for refusing fondling, while another received $300 for more compliant behavior, and a rumor existed of $1000 for intercourse.
Contact for appointments was made directly with the witness by Kellen, and girls who were favored might later be contacted directly, cutting the witness out of the payment.
